message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,350,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm confident this product holds even greater value for your business. How about we meet in the middle at $1,375,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $1,325,000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
